::Killfest::

Killfest nods, walking into the quarters.

"From what I understand of the history of the war before I got here, 
the Ark was a major fighting location. Any of the old factions could 
have some Decepticons."

He looks around Motormaster's quarters. "Although my Predacons don't, 
and I don't see any indication of Darkfate's having any either."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Yes, well we still intend to find out where our leader is. That's 
why we
> took prisoners, in exchange for information of where the 
Decepticons from
> the Ark may be. Enjoy it thought, because from now on we will show 
no more
> mercy to fallen opponents." He says continuesly walking. He arrives 
at a
> door on the right, with many more down the hall. "Here is my 
quarters, we
> can speak in private in here" he says opening it, and entering.
